documents.document: @beck_imogen @luciedeess @surgeonshall hi Imogen, thanks for the lovely feedback, most appreciated. Thanks to you and Lucie for coming!

@surgeonshall thank you for having me, was really enjoyable and a lovely audience. History on a Friday night, what more could you want!
@BurkesBones thanks Mr Burke! Hope you are coping with the visitors today!
@cuthbertneil @surgeonshall thanks for really kind feedback Neil, was really nice to chat to you afterwards too. Thanks for coming along!
@ilona_turnbull hi Ilona, B&H would not have selected with this in mind, more a case of who was more vulnerable, an easy target or lodgers.
@intergeri really glad you enjoyed it and hope your friend did too. I'm genuinely really fond of Dumfries, lovely town 😊
@anatomyfound Hi Janet, thank you for coming along & for signing my copy of your book!Great read.It's important to acknowledge new research!
@HelenHeggie hope you enjoyed it Helen and ofcourse exploring the museum afterwards, its such an amazing place!
@Dr_JZP thanks very much for coming along Jennifer and for such lovely feedback, really very much appreciated.
@RozEmerson thanks very much for such lovely feedback Rosalind. Hope you enjoyed exploring the amazing @surgeonshall afterwards!
@Charlotte_0 thanks alot for coming along Charlotte, glad you enjoyed it and I appreciate the tweet. Hope you enjoyed exploring the museum!
